basicInfo.name: Spike
basicInfo.flavor: Spike is a self-made tyrant with plans to immerse the world in the bitter cold. The only thing that could stop Spike would be thawing his frozen heart.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s) upon using a basic attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack plus 15% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Frozen Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack plus 15% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
スキル強化効果
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack plus 18% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Increases Chance: Freeze chance becomes 70%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 40% of Max HP.

Skill 2.name: Icequake
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 32% of Physical Attack plus 8% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 40% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack plus 9% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Increases Chance: Freeze chance becomes 50%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 40% of Max HP.

Passive.name: Heart of Ice
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Max HP-Based Attack Boost. [Always Active]
 - Deals additional damage equal to 15% of the caster's Max HP against targets inflicted with [Freeze].
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Max HP-Based Attack max becomes 1320.
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 34%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 60% of Max HP upon triggering Guts.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Lania, Jave, deer meat stew, hamburgers, tranquility, quiet, reading, fishing, exercise
profile.dislikes: Lania, frozen fruit, disarray, noise, small detailed machinery
profile.story: Spike is a self-made tyrant with plans to immerse the world in the bitter cold. The only thing that could stop Spike would be thawing his frozen heart.

basicInfo.name: Spike
basicInfo.flavor: Spike has learned the skills of a merciless berserker in the harshest of environments and works to make the Blizzard Plains the strongest land in the realm. He has become a true master of the cold.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Physical Attack plus 11% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s) upon using a basic attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Frozen Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 175% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Icequake
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Physical Attack plus 7% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Heart of Ice
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Max HP-Based Attack Boost. [Always Active]
 - Deals additional damage equal to 15% of the caster's Max HP against targets inflicted with [Freeze].
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Always Active]

basicInfo.name: Spike
basicInfo.flavor: Unconfirmed rumors say Spike is the son of Queen Lania. He is a berserker with a heart of ice, wielding powerful ice attacks.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s) upon using a basic attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.

 - 50% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

All Enemies

スキル強化効果
